code: import React from"react";import{CircularProgressbar}from"react-circular-progressbar";import"react-circular-progressbar/dist/styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardsSeries=_ref=>{let{movie}=_ref;const notation=Math.floor(movie.vote_average*10);function convertDate(dateString){var months=["janvier","février","mars","avril","mai","juin","juillet","août","septembre","octobre","novembre","décembre"];var date=new Date(dateString);var day=date.getDate();var monthIndex=date.getMonth();var year=date.getFullYear();if(day<10){day="0"+day;}var formattedDate=day+" "+months[monthIndex]+" "+year;return formattedDate;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.poster_path?"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original"+movie.poster_path:"./img/noimg.jpeg",alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"infos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notation",style:{width:35,height:35},background:"#141414",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgressbar,{value:notation,text:"".concat(notation,"%"),strokeWidth:15,background:"#141414",styles:{root:{width:"100%"},path:{stroke:notation>66?"#1ABC9C":notation>33?"#F39C12":"#E74C3C"},trail:{stroke:"#141414"},text:{fill:"#141414",fontSize:"30px",fontWeight:"bold"}}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"movie-title",children:movie.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"date",children:convertDate(movie.first_air_date)})]})]});};export default CardsSeries;
